title: Riot Help I can't choose a ward skin!
body: I have been in 3 diffrent games and can't choose a ward skin.

replies.body:
Alive and well, thanks for asking. :D

What kind of error or messaging are you seeing when you try to select a ward skin? If you could also [grab a screenshot with Gyazo](https://gyazo.com/) and post the link here, that may help me work with you to resolve this.
It is working now 2 days later ):
